Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
As an exclusive service to our clients, we would like to welcome you to Safari365 and the Members Club.
Safari365 takes great pride in creating unique adventures to this incredible continent, and will be at your service throughout the planning and travelling process of your African safari.
So as to get started, please access your Members Club by clicking here to read other travelers reviews and information about your dedicated travel consultant, {!Lead.OwnerFullName}.
You will also find details of our exclusive offer, a high quality complimentary photo book you will receive after travelling with us (this is over and above the excellent rates, service and local knowledge we offer)
We look forward to welcoming you to Africa
Safari365
